message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that price for it.

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $85. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $85. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. That's as low as I'm willing to go.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $80. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $87.50. It's still a great price, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm not willing to go any higher than $82.50. That's my final offer.
